string.value: #p1101002# suggested that you take your Mount and go see #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor,#k saying that your Mount may be in trouble.
#p1101002# suggested that you take your Mount and go see #p1102002#, the Mount Instructor, saying that your Mount may be in trouble.
#b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k is looking for you. It seemed like there was a problem with your Mount. I'm not sure what exactly, but I suggest you take your Mount and go see #p1102002# at once.
I overheard something about your Mount. It could be weakening! If you want more details, go see #p1102002# now!

#p1102002# didn't seem too happy. I think it has something to do with your Mount. This is all I can tell you right now, but if you wish to continue riding your Mount without seeing him, I can't stop you.
Long time no see, #h0#. I'm so happy to hear that you've become a Chief Knight, but this may pose an issue for your Mount.
You haven't gone to #b#p1102002##k yet? Hm, it seemed rather urgent. You're only hurting yourself by wasting time.
